knimeNode.name: DFG Visualizer
knimeNode.shortDescription: JS GraphViz Directly Follows Miner Visualization

fullDescription.intro:
This node implements a JavaScript Visualization of a Directly Follows Model.
It visualizes all possible traces (order of activities). The green nodes are the start activities and the red activities are the end activity. The number on the arcs that connect to another activity displays the number of traces that choose the following activity after the current activity.
